Constituent.Name: Phosphorus
Constituent.Description: Total Phosphorus Model for the Chesapeake Bay Watershed reported in SIR 2011-5167

Source.Name: CBP Point Source
Source.Description: Total phosphorus from point sources in kilograms per year. Chesapeake Bay Program (CBP) Total Phosphorus, 2002 primarily municipal wastewater.

Source.Name: Total Fertilizer
Source.Description: Commercial fertilizer applied to all crops, in addition to crop fixation.

Source.Name: Total Manure
Source.Description: Manure from confined and unconfined sources, distributed on rowcrops and pasture defined by 2001 National Land Cover Dataset (NLCD).

Source.Name: Urban Area
Source.Description: Total Urban Area defined by 2001 National Land Cover Dataset (NLCD).

CommonTerms.Term:
Each model has different sources that the modeler has determined to be statistically significant. Choose a source from the list to present data only from that source. This model contains these sources:
All Not really a separate source, it just tallies all the sources together. Reported in kg. CBP Point Source Total phosphorus from point sources in kilograms per year. Chesapeake Bay Program (CBP) Total Phosphorus, 2002 primarily municipal wastewater. Total Fertilizer Commercial fertilizer applied to all crops, in addition to crop fixation. Total Manure Manure from confined and unconfined sources, distributed on rowcrops and pasture defined by 2001 NLCD. Urban Area Total Urban Area defined by 2001 National Land Cover Dataset (NLCD). Siliciclastic rocks Area underlain by siliciclastic rocks. Crystalline rocks Area underlain by crystalline rocks.
